name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Give Freely: You Save, We Give, Charities Win

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save money and support your favorite charity simultaneously with Give Freely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every time you shop online, you have the power to change someone‚Äôs life. Imagine being able to help a child receive an education, or support vital cancer research, just by doing what you already do‚Äîbuying what you need. With Give Freely, you can make a difference without spending a single extra penny.

When you install Give Freely, you unlock a world of savings while also giving back to those who need it most. We search for the best coupons at over 10,000 stores and automatically apply them at checkout‚Äîso you get discounts, up to 15% or more, and we donate 100% of the commissions we earn to the charity of your choice.

It‚Äôs a simple way for your everyday purchases to support your favorite causes‚Äîwhether that‚Äôs fighting hunger, helping disaster victims, rescuing animals, or planting more trees. Every time you shop, you‚Äôre making a tangible impact.

Here‚Äôs why you should download Give Freely today:

üíù Give without spending more: Every time you shop, we donate to your chosen cause, at no extra cost to you.

üí∞ Save money, make a difference: Automatically apply coupons at checkout, saving up to 15% or more at over 10,000 stores.

‚è≤ Install in seconds: It only takes a minute, and all you have to do is choose a charity you care about (over 1 million choices).

üíå Zero spam, zero hassle: We just need your name, email, and your favorite charity. We‚Äôll never share your details (unless you ask us to), and there‚Äôs no catch.  We don‚Äôt want your credit card information!

üåè Support what matters most: Whether it‚Äôs education, health, or the environment, or literally over a million other causes, your shopping can change lives‚Äîwithout changing your budget.

üéâ Join the movement: Download Give Freely now, and transform your shopping into a force for good. Together, we can create a world where every purchase makes the world a little brighter.

Give Freely‚Äôs mission is to generate as many donations to non-profit organizations as possible.  We do this by donating 100% of the commissions that online stores pay us when users buy something at a partner site, as well as occasionally placing advertisements on sites that you may visit.  These advertisements are always relevant to you, generate incremental revenue necessary to help sustain Give Freely as a business, and incremental revenue that is donated to charity.  Give Freely is transparent about its financials, including that the cofounder and CEO does not receive any salary or bonus.  The company has no outside investors, and no profit motive, only wishing to build a global community that generates millions in donations to worthwhile causes.  For more information, please see our transparency policy: https://givefreely.com/transparency/

By using this browser extension, you agree to the Give Freely Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms & Conditions: https://givefreely.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: https://givefreely.com/privacy-policy/
 
Give Freely may get paid commissions directly from companies and/or via affiliate programs on sites visited and/or products purchased while using this browser extension.  These commissions/affiliate-payments become the donations that go to your selected charity.

Disclaimer:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout.
